name: ConceptMapR5DeviceAssociationElementsForR4Device
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `DeviceAssociation` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.meta`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.implicitRules`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.language`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.text`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.contained`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.identifier`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.device` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceAssociation.category` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceAssociation.status` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceAssociation.statusReason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.statusReason`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.statusReason` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead.
Element `DeviceAssociation.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `Device.patient`.
Element `DeviceAssociation.bodyStructure` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceAssociation.period` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceAssociation.operation` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.

Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.status` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceAssociation.operation` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.status` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.

Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.operator` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceAssociation.operation` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.operator` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.

Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceAssociation.operation` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `DeviceAssociation.operation.period` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `Device`, but has no target element specified.
